account_id.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the workspace.

default.description: Flag indicating if this workspace is set as the default workspace.

count.description: The total number of forms belonging to this workspace.

href.description: The URL to retrieve the list of forms associated with this workspace.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

href.description: The URL to retrieve the details of this workspace.

shared.description: Flag indicating if this workspace is shared with other users.
